name: Loki
skill: Deals 1040/1240 DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a 100% chance of inflicting Burn.
ability: Skill attacks have a significant chance of inflicting Paralysis.
Skill attacks by Phantasma team members have a slight chance of inflicting Paralysis.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a trickster god from Norse mythology. He's a professional when it comes to copying someone's appearance and voice—even family members and close relatives can't tell the difference. His skills were displayed at their fullest when he took on Mikado's form one time. Weeks went by without anyone noticing a thing. Then Mikado showed up just the moment when he finally revealed himself, almost as if to take his place. She looked very pleased with him for some reason, and also much more tan than before...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 31/01/17 - 31/03/17
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "Leave it to me, and I promise you'll be fully entertained!"
skill: "Hm... What shall I do to you today?"
summon: "Hey, could you hold this for a sec?"
limit_break: "I came up with the best prank! Wanna see?"
